sentence: It is a race to the bottom in the currency markets.
The winner is whoever has the weakest currency.
Over the past year the U.S. dollar has skyrocketed which of course is a negative for demand of U.S. goods and services.
Russel Napier believes that the dollar can continue to go higher.
